name: Red Mist: Chapter 1 (Alpha)
description:
After the performance squidward  is sent into a spiriling depresion. sponge is sent out to hunt him down in the forest. Mr Krabs does NOT care about his mental health. Mr Krabs wants him back so he can make money!

Keep shining your flashlight at the ghostly squidward! If not on him for too long he will get ya!!
